favourite.article: Strengthen us with Power through Your Spirit into our inner man that Christ may make His home in our hearts. Save us from self centredeness that we may be built up with all the saints for a dwelling place for You O God our love here on earth.
May our vision be broadened and may the Lord bless us more with Himself that we would give ourselves and live for His purpose. Hallelujah!
May Christ make His home in all our hearts! Lord, make us one with Your heart's desire!
Give us sight to see Your purpose— Build Yourself into our being! Mind, emotion, will, Lord, we give to You— All our heart Your home must be.
